description: My name is Lucas Chan, and I am currently an MPhil student at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). I have a strong passion for artificial intelligence, machine learning, and financial engineering. My experience includes developing machine learning models for diverse applications like stock forecasting, federated learning, and optical character recognition. Prior to my MPhil studies, I earned a double degree in Computer Science and Electronic Engineering from HKUST, graduating with First Class Honours. I am eager to find opportunities where I can use my AI and machine learning skills to tackle real-world challenges.
